newsitem.title: USA: Safeway sees Q2 EPS over $0.54 before strike.
newsitem.headline: Safeway sees Q2 EPS over $0.54 before strike.

text.p: Safeway Inc said Friday that excluding the effect of a strike in Alberta earnings are expected to exceed analysts consensus estimates of $0.54 per share.
However Safeway said it is unable to determine the impact of the Alberta strike on second-quarter earnings.
The company also said same-store sales for the quarter, again excluding the effect of the Alberta strike, are expected to be between 2.0 percent and 2.5 percent.
The company said same-store sales have softened compared to recently reported quarters.
The company's second quarter ends June 14.
